column1: In these circumstances court decides to  issue an interim order as prayed by the  petition in prayer (a) of
the petition, subject to following conditions,

column2: 3rd  Respondent  is  not  permitted  to  carry  out  any  further  construction/  development  work
until the final determination of this case

If  the 
3rd  Respondent  has 
already  obtained 
the  Certificate  of  Conformity 
for 
the
construction  in  question,  he  is  permitted  to  carryon  with  business  he  is  permitted  to  do
until the final determination of this case
